MR 16–24 months 0.5 ml

booster. 
3rd to 9th doses are given at an interval of 6

(2 lakh IU)
Oral
TT 10 years and 16 years 0.5 ml Intramuscular in upper arm.
*  TT-2 or booster dose is to be given before 36 weeks of pregnancy.
